trans-unit.source: Represents a COM class that is described in a manifest.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> class.
Gets the class identifier (ClsId) for a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> object.

A <xref:System.String> formatted in the pattern {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx}, where the value of the GUID is represented as a series of lower-case hexadecimal digits in groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 digits and separated by hyphens.
An example of a return value is "{382c74c3-721d-4f34-80e5-57657b6cbc27}".
Gets the description of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> object.
A description of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> object.
Gets the programmatic identifier (ProgId) of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> object.
The programmatic identifier of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> object.
Gets the threading model of a <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass"></xref> object.
A string such as "Apartment".
Gets a value that is the identifier of the type library that contains type information about the class.
The identifier of the type library that contains type information about the class.

A <xref:System.String> formatted in the pattern {xxxxxxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx}, where the value of the GUID is represented as a series of lower-case hexadecimal digits in groups of 8, 4, 4, 4, and 12 digits and separated by hyphens.
An example of a return value is "{382c74c3-721d-4f34-80e5-57657b6cbc27}".
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ClsId*> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ClsId*> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.Description*> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.Description*> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ProgId*> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ProgId*> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ThreadingModel*> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.ThreadingModel*> property.
Gets or sets a property that is used to serialize the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.TlbId*> property to an XML file.
The value of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.ComClass.TlbId*> property.
